fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill someone I guess. It counts as a modkill. If this ability is copied, the person who copied this ability has their attack permanently upgraded to unstoppable if they have an attack. If they don’t have an attack. They gain invincible defense permanently.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role cannot spawn normally and is made purposefully so Fucker (4251) can copy it’s abilities
- If you’re rerolled into this role from another role’s ability, the player who changed your character explodes and dies

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: You win since you got rerolled into this role (yay)
